summary: Defines a simulation scenario class that configures a perfect comprehensive emergency obstetric and newborn care (CEMONC) environment within a skilled birth attendance framework. It handles parameter selection, logging of the configuration, and specifies the set of health system and disease modules required for the model.
business_intent: Enable researchers and policymakers to run a baseline maternal and perinatal health simulation under ideal CEMONC conditions, facilitating assessment of health outcomes and policy impacts in a controlled, highâ€‘quality care setting.
